code:
C4Context
accTitle: C4 context demo
accDescr: Many large C4 diagrams

title System Context diagram for Internet Banking System

Enterprise_Boundary(b0, "BankBoundary0") {
    Person(customerA, "Banking Customer A", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.")
    Person(customerB, "Banking Customer B")
    Person_Ext(customerC, "Banking Customer C", "desc")

    Person(customerD, "Banking Customer D", "A customer of the bank,  with personal bank accounts.")

    System(SystemAA, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to view information about their bank accounts, and make payments.")

    Enterprise_Boundary(b1, "BankBoundary") {

      SystemDb_Ext(SystemE, "Mainframe Banking System", "Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions, etc.")

      System_Boundary(b2, "BankBoundary2") {
        System(SystemA, "Banking System A")
        System(SystemB, "Banking System B", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts. next line.")
      }

      System_Ext(SystemC, "E-mail system", "The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system.")
      SystemDb(SystemD, "Banking System D Database", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts.")

      Boundary(b3, "BankBoundary3", "boundary") {
        SystemQueue(SystemF, "Banking System F Queue", "A system of the bank.")
        SystemQueue_Ext(SystemG, "Banking System G Queue", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts.")
      }
    }
  }

BiRel(customerA, SystemAA, "Uses")
BiRel(SystemAA, SystemE, "Uses")
Rel(SystemAA, SystemC, "Sends e-mails", "SMTP")
Rel(SystemC, customerA, "Sends e-mails to")

UpdateElementStyle(customerA, $fontColor="red", $bgColor="grey", $borderColor="red")
UpdateRelStyle(customerA, SystemAA, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetX="5")
UpdateRelStyle(SystemAA, SystemE, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetY="-10")
UpdateRelStyle(SystemAA, SystemC, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetY="-40", $offsetX="-50")
UpdateRelStyle(SystemC, customerA, $textColor="red", $lineColor="red", $offsetX="-50", $offsetY="20")

UpdateLayoutConfig($c4ShapeInRow="3", $c4BoundaryInRow="1")
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 b0, "BankBoundary0" 和 customerA, "Banking Customer A", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 这一块。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 b0, "BankBoundary0"处理。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'b0, "BankBoundary0"处理'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 customerB, "Banking Customer B" 和 customerC, "Banking Customer C", "desc" 的环节。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 customerB, "Banking Customer B"处理 才对。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'customerB, "Banking Customer B"处理'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

这里必须包含 customerD, "Banking Customer D", "A customer of the bank,  with personal bank accounts." 和 SystemAA, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to view information about their bank accounts, and make payments." 这一块。
不，其实叫 customerD, "Banking Customer D", "A customer of the bank,  with personal bank accounts."处理 会更准确一点。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'customerD, "Banking Customer D", "A customer of the bank,  with personal bank accounts."处理'。
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 b1, "BankBoundary" 和 SystemE, "Mainframe Banking System", "Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions, etc." 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'b1, "BankBoundary" 和 SystemE, "Mainframe Banking System", "Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions, etc."'？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 b2, "BankBoundary2" 和 SystemA, "Banking System A" 的环节。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'b2, "BankBoundary2" 和 SystemA, "Banking System A"'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 SystemB, "Banking System B", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts. next line." 和 SystemC, "E-mail system", "The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system."。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'SystemB, "Banking System B", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts. next line." 和 SystemC, "E-mail system", "The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system."'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 SystemD, "Banking System D Database", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 和 b3, "BankBoundary3", "boundary" 的环节。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'SystemD, "Banking System D Database", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 和 b3, "BankBoundary3", "boundary"'，对吧？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 SystemF, "Banking System F Queue", "A system of the bank." 和 SystemG, "Banking System G Queue", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 的环节。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'SystemF, "Banking System F Queue", "A system of the bank." 和 SystemG, "Banking System G Queue", "A system of the bank, with personal bank accounts."'？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 customerA, SystemAA, "Uses" 和 SystemAA, SystemE, "Uses" 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'customerA, SystemAA, "Uses" 和 SystemAA, SystemE, "Uses"'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 SystemAA, SystemC, "Sends e-mails", "SMTP" 和 SystemC, customerA, "Sends e-mails to" 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'SystemAA, SystemC, "Sends e-mails", "SMTP" 和 SystemC, customerA, "Sends e-mails to"'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 customerA, $fontColor="red", $bgColor="grey", $borderColor="red" 和 customerA, SystemAA, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetX="5" 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'customerA, $fontColor="red", $bgColor="grey", $borderColor="red" 和 customerA, SystemAA, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetX="5"'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 SystemAA, SystemE, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetY="-10" 和 SystemAA, SystemC, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetY="-40", $offsetX="-50" 的环节。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'SystemAA, SystemE, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetY="-10" 和 SystemAA, SystemC, $textColor="blue", $lineColor="blue", $offsetY="-40", $offsetX="-50"'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 SystemC, customerA, $textColor="red", $lineColor="red", $offsetX="-50", $offsetY="20" 和 $c4ShapeInRow="3", $c4BoundaryInRow="1" 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'SystemC, customerA, $textColor="red", $lineColor="red", $offsetX="-50", $offsetY="20" 和 $c4ShapeInRow="3", $c4BoundaryInRow="1"'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
